settings.content_1:
Shipping

  • GROUND. At Present, offers FREE ground shipping via USPS on orders going to any destination in the contiguous United States. Please allow 3-8 business days for arrival and processing time.
  • EXPEDITED. We offer expedited orders via UPS 2-Day delivery and UPS Overnight.
  • INTERNATIONAL. We don't currently offer international shipping online. Reach out to today@atpresent.com, and we can help arrange international shipping. International packages ship with a flat fee of $30 and are sent via DHL. International shipments may be subject to additional customs, duties, and fees, which are the full responsibility of the recipient.

See more details on shipping

Returns

We want you to love your piece. Seriously, you should love your jewelry! We have a 100-day return policy, which means you have 100 days after purchasing your items to request a return or exchange.

Not sure are you going to love it? Uncertain how it will fit? We are delighted to facilitate at-home try-ons. If it doesn't work or you aren't in love with it when you see it in person, we're delighted to take it back for a full-refund.

See more details on returns
settings.content_2:
Jewelry should last a lifetime (and then some).

Email today@atpresent.com for additional assistance.
